price: 17. Idinku ma aydaan layn (gaalada), Alle baase laayey. Mana aadan ganayn4 markaad  ganeysay (cadowga), wuxuuse ahaa Alle Kan Ganay, waa si uu Xaggiisa uga jarribo mu’miniinta jarribaad wanaagsan; hubaal Alle waa wax kasta Maqle, wax kasta Og.
arabic: فَلَمۡ تَقۡتُلُوهُمۡ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَتَلَهُمۡۚ وَمَا رَمَيۡتَ إِذۡ رَمَيۡتَ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ رَمَىٰ وَلِيُبۡلِيَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ مِنۡهُ بَلَآءً حَسَنًاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٞ
footnotes: 4. Markii uu Nabigu s.c.w. ku ganay gacan muggeed oo carro ah wejiyada gaalada, Alle wuxuu sababay inay buuxiso indhaha iyo sanka askari kasta oo ka mid ah gaalada, taasoo u diidday inay horay u soo dhaqaaqaan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: falam taqtulūhum walākinna al-laha qatalahum wamā ramayta idh ramayta walākinna al-laha ramā waliyub'liya al-mu'minīna min'hu balāan ḥasanan inna al-laha samīʿun ʿalīmun
